website_summaries.verdict: An attractive outdoor light, this option is also very efficient thanks to its LED bulb and dimmer switch.
pros: A soft white LED bulb is included
Ships with a dimmer switch and mounting hardware
Easy to install with an attractive, rustic look
cons: The trim ring on this light floats and can rattle in the wind

customer_reviews.title: Pretty. Led cost savings is a big plus.
customer_reviews.text: The "Charlie" light is very attractive and the seeded glass is a nice touch. The bulb adds visual interest along with the cost savings of led. I returned mine because I planned to use outside in a frequently windy location. The bottom metal ring on the glass shade is free floating on the glass rim and jiggles around easily. This would drive me bonkers on windy days. Would be great in a protected location.
customer_reviews.author: MitzyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, gets the job done, I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool looking lamp. I wanted a porch light that has the bulb pointing down since my old one pointed up. Install was easy, no problem. It comes with a cool looking bulb that you see in the promo photo, but I didn't use it because the illumination is weak compared to other bulbs. I used my Feit LED 100watt-comparable bulb that uses 15watts and it works great. I plan to eventually buy two more and install them on the front of my garage. I like that there aren't many obstructions from the design of the product so you get all the light coming through instead of seeing shadows like other designs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: If the light wasn't so great, I would have taken another star off
customer_reviews.text: If the light wasn't so great, I would have taken another star off. I have ordered 3 and have had to search for the hardware rolling around in all three upon opening the box. Also, the trim ring on the globe just sits there. It is not tightly seated or does it lock into place. I fixed this by adding a dab of silicone to hold it in place. Every time the wind blew, you could hear it outside rattling.
customer_reviews.author: Rob in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lights!!!
customer_reviews.text: My previous porch lights were base model typical outdoor fixtures, they didn't work well at all and I always had to tell people coming by our house would be pretty much the darkest in the neighborhood. These were installed today with ease and included the bulbs! I love the way they look and they are a significant improvement compared to the ones they replaced! I also love that the bottom is open because I won't have to worry about moths and bugs getting stuck in the housing! The price was also fantastic and prime shipping is always a wonderful bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Broken Oak Acre

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive, perfect size for one story home.
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor wall lamp looks absolutely perfect on the front of my one-story brick house. The only issue that I have with it is that the bulb does not hang straight. If I had more time I am sure that I could fix that myself. Unfortunately, I do not as I am selling the house. I will leave this to the new owner with the satisfaction of knowing that he has a beautiful lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Decent but check before installing if you purchase more then one!
customer_reviews.text: I have to order this product twice. First time two different types of fixture, one has a bigger base and a little different. The bubble glass is the same. Second time I had to order another to match one or the other. But the bubble glass is different so I had to keep the existing bubble glass and switch out the base. Since the last I bought it the price jumped 4.00 so this is a bit irritating that they dont check on the product itself before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fixture for our back deck, and couldn't be happier! It looks great, was super easy to install and really adds the perfect amount of style and light to our deck. I was a little nervous ordering a light fixture online, but I could not find anything locally, so I took the chance. So glad I did! I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: scrappygirl

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful - I bought two of them
customer_reviews.text: The light is a little more orangey-yellow then I would prefer but that can be changed out with the bulb. Also the glass has a permanently wet looking effect which matches my front light. It's beautiful - I bought two of them!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Will buy more!
customer_reviews.text: Nice modern upgrade from the last setup we had. Installed the same one on our patio. Install was straightforward. Exactly how the old one came out is how this one went in... It's great because we upgraded our chandelier to the exact same Sansa style from Globe! So far everythings been working great! I'll definitely buy 2 more soon to install outside our garage!
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Vintage look with a nice warm glow
customer_reviews.text: I searched around before purchasing this light. I wanted something rustic looking to match my decor and the lighting to be warm, not too bright and not too dark. This light hit the mark. The light itself wasn’t too hard to install, once I figured out that the mounting plate was on backwards! It is LED and the light it comes with is perfectly warm, yet gives off a nice glow. It looks like an expensive light and it’s pretty well made. All in all a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D.

customer_reviews.title: Great design, sturdy, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This product came free of defects and was extremely easy to install. Directions are not step by step, but following the diagram is simple enough. It came with all necessary parts (excluding lightbulb) and was well packaged. This item provides lots of light in a hallway that doesn't have any windows. It is bright enough to be safe on the stairs in the middle of the night. It also creates cool shadows because of the bars.
customer_reviews.author: Cas Hruska

customer_reviews.title: Plays well above its price!
customer_reviews.text: This budget fixture looks like you paid two or three times the price, and it doesn't cut corners with plastic parts. Easy to hang in a backyard gazebo. Instead of running a power line, I screwed in a 12V, 5W standard base LED bulb, wired to a battery that's kept charged by a solar panel on the gazebo roof. Works perfectly, the interior chimney diffuses the light well, and we get complements on how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Borisgoodenough

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Light
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice light but I think it's best to use a photocell bulb with it instead of the bulb that comes with the light. I wish they offered a clear glass version because I think the raIn drop bubbles in the glass make it look dirty. It's a very nice light tho... a tip if you want to keep bugs out of it > a plastic coffee can lid fits perfectly on the bottom, just cut a circle inside the plastic lid and glue some screen in it. It works : )
customer_reviews.author: D. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great update to the outside of our house
customer_reviews.text: We really love the look on the outside of our home. Our house is 21 years old, and we had the original fixtures up. We also bought two hanging ones for our front porch. They are good quality and really update our home. We just did our roof, and now our exterior looks fresh and modern. When I take walks, I notice all my neighbors old fixtures! My husband and son were able to install no problem.
customer_reviews.author: AMF

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Only downside was that installation want straight forward on my existing porch light electrical set up. We had to me around with things to get it to fit correctly and so it lands a tiny bit forward. I live in a manufactured home so not sure if that was the problem. Nothing ever seems "standard" in this place. 🤷‍♀️ Its GORGEOUS though! Matches some solar lights I have in the backyard. I love unique whimsical items so this was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kasmadrigal

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Everything was well packaged and undamaged. All installation parts were there and everything looks great! Update: After buying a second dimmer I found out it was the fault of the bulbs that came with the light. Replaced the bulbs and everything worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: Love these light fixtures. They look super high end for the price. The seeded glass is very pretty. The LED light bulbs are actually really good looking that come with them, that’s impressive usually Edison led bulbs don’t look good so I’m basically as happy as possible with these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda May

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought that the vintage bulbs might not be bright enough, but they are fine. Whole new look to the house. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ljevans

customer_reviews.title: Hours of work and missing parts....
customer_reviews.text: The directions were awful and we ended up spending three hours figuring it all out only to find that a piece of the mounting bracket was missing. Called Global repeatedly and and left messages. No one returned our calls. Not worth the hassle at all! It is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: A special light fixture.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light. Instructions were straight forward and easy to read diagrams. The golden 5 year light bulb shines through the clear seeded glass fixture to light up the whole front porch. Bottom part of the glass has a rim that is made loose but not a problem. I like this fixture so much I ordered 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Lou P

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Modern and easy to install. We are doing upgrades to our home and one easy thing we did was get new lights. There is a picture of the old light still on the wall and the new one being held up next to it for comparison, then a picture after the swap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Product is well made and looks great. My neighbor actually came over and asked where I got them after they were installed. The only concern that I had as part of the install was the length and type of the bolts provided with the bracket assembly that mounts to the electric box. They are metric 4Mx0.7 and they were way too short to go from the electric box, through the siding mount panel and finally through the fixture. I reused the bolts from the original light but the threaded cap provided was also metric. I ordered some 6-32 black caps to hold the fixture in place on Amazon. After that everything went great! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: TJM

customer_reviews.title: They look great they are a nice size and love the water ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these for the back of my house. They look great they are a nice size and love the water droplets. They come with bulb which is led and looks like a Edison bulb. I had points with amazon so I got an even better price. Very happy with this product. They look really nice and love the size.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Estevez

customer_reviews.title: Great update!
customer_reviews.text: Super happy! The lights are just as I expected. I was a little worried they’d be too small for our 3 story house and in comparison to the giant lights we were replacing but they’re not, they’re the perfect size. Love them. And they came w a lightbulb - bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Sara M Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Great front porch light...and classy looking too
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my outdoor lights after a log restoration ( log home ). I bought these since they looked the part. I could not be happier. Easy to install. The light casts a significant arc which I needed. They are well constructed, everything is tight. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: spaddriverdavis

customer_reviews.title: Nice new lighting
customer_reviews.text: These lights were just the thing to replace our very old back porch light fixtures with. The bulbs are pretty and plenty bright enough, glass shade is different with the bubbles in it. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HLoden

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, easy to install; built well with metal and glass
customer_reviews.text: Installed 2 of these outdoors under a porch. Were easy to install. Housing is all metal - no plastic. Globe is real glass, not plastic. I have bought several fixtures made by Globe electric - all have been well made and long lasting. Good value for the reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: bad hardware
customer_reviews.text: hardware to mount doesn't work. it expects that you can mount onto electrical bow at an angel but to level the light it has to be horizontal. screws too long to mount fixture to mounting hardware. bad engineering
customer_reviews.author: GCM

customer_reviews.title: Chain way too short
customer_reviews.text: Just received our light and was super excited to install. However, the chain is extremely short. I planned on swooping the light about a foot over to be center over my dining room table and due to the shorter chain/wires it will end up being right at the ceiling. I'm considering returning this :(
customer_reviews.author: Carrie R.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive modern light fixture
customer_reviews.text: I installed this by the stairs going to the basement. It is a very impressive, modern style light fixture. I put an Edison bulb in it to give it that extra little flair but any clear bulb would look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fixture
customer_reviews.text: I had this installed on my front porch to replace an ugly and outdated fixture. My handyman did not experience any difficulties in installing it. The old fashioned bulb adds a very nice touch. There is no motion detection feature on this item. It’s very pretty and I like it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Ca Rose

customer_reviews.title: It was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, easy to install, perfect amount of light for the back porch. Love it. Highly recommend if you need an updated look & are tired of simply replacing the light bulb.
customer_reviews.author: VegasEve

customer_reviews.title: VERY ATTRACTIVE LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive outdoor light, but it was too big for the area by our entry door, so did have to return it. Love the simplicity, yet elegant look of the light.
customer_reviews.author: LJP

customer_reviews.title: Not oil rubbed bronze
customer_reviews.text: It is painted brown with painted on gold trim...not terrible but looks cheap to me. The glass is pretty though.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet beautiful
customer_reviews.text: They look beautiful and even came with an Edison light buld. Wonderful surprise as I bought extra. My husband said they were easy to install although on our house we had to cut down the shortest screws included to have the bits flush.
customer_reviews.author: Jax A.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this myself and it is very simple. Absolutely love these. I did however use a different bulb than what it came with. Just wanted the bright white led instead.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Great light for the price. Very modern and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I love this outdoor light. Exactly what we had been looking for. I gave it 4 stars out of 5 because of the fact that the arm of the light doesn't stick straight out from the base and is angled down slightly which tends to bother me but I'm sure no one else would notice. Besides that, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Collins

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Sharp looking outdoor wall light. Easy to mount. Will be able to speak more to the quality and how well they work at a later time when they are all installed and have been used awhile.
customer_reviews.author: ETexNana

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. I bought it for a backyard patio. I'm not really in need of lighting, but it looks great and the lighting is very bright.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gift For You

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, perfect size, stylish
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with these lights because they were easy to install and had a small mounting bracket for the trim on our house (which was difficult to find!). Easy to install. Love the look of the glass.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase
customer_reviews.text: I will be returning these lights. On one of the lights, the horizontal bars are crooked and cannot be straightened. On the second one, the light was broken where it connects to the top. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fixtures
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights!! Sooo pretty, lots of compliments. Kindof a pain to install but I have 27 year old wiring so there’s that...
customer_reviews.author: She VN

customer_reviews.title: These were a good value and look great
customer_reviews.text: I was able to replace 6 old wall fixtures with these in one afternoon. For my skill set, that makes these pretty easy to install. My wife is happy, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Don G.

customer_reviews.title: Too Short!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my light in the mail. At first I was so excited. Then I saw the length of the chain. It’s not even 34” long. In the picture, it shows a long chain and in the q&a’s it states that the chain is 4 to 5 feet long. Not even close. This is going to look ridiculously short hanging from my ceiling. I will probably be sending this back :(
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Eakins

customer_reviews.title: Great quality light
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I loved this light so much we both the matching pendant light for the porch and flush mount for the hallways.
customer_reviews.author: Andy W.

customer_reviews.title: good looking
customer_reviews.text: So far these are some of the nicest lamps I have. They look great at my beach house. Will follow up with how they stand up to the salt air.
customer_reviews.author: amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Nice golden hue to the light. Good mood lighting. Needs a different bulb if you want lots of intense light.
customer_reviews.author: John Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and a good value, plus the included Edison-style LED bulb adds a cool vintage-modern touch. One of seven fixtures that I ordered came out of the box with the glass portion broken, but Amazon shipped me a replacement within two days.
customer_reviews.author: I. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and awesome, warm glow
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! So easy to install and love the yellow light this bulb gives off. Not the harsh “blue” that is extremely common. Extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Broek

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, good value, wrong choice for bulb
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with the appearance and solid construction. My only knock is that the retro bulb is very bright, more like a high-intensity yard light. Not very welcoming for a porch light.
customer_reviews.author: redturn2

customer_reviews.title: Touch of modern
customer_reviews.text: My husband surprised me with these at our front door. They're perfect. They gave our house a nice face lift without being too jarringly modern.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hubbs

customer_reviews.title: Nice light
customer_reviews.text: Nice light, but the metal is not very sturdy and can bend easily. Be careful when installing.
customer_reviews.author: Jean E. Rath

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamps
customer_reviews.text: These are great lamps and look awesome. My only recommendation for the manufacturer would be to make the thumb screws captive.. they’re small and you drop them when changing bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 and replaced different sizes
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these lights for my new garage. Items had 2 different backs and looks awful by one another. Had bought one previous and had to take off to go to a different spot so they would match
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Noland

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, easy to install; good value for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Housing is all metal, no plastic. Globe is real glass, and thick. Installed two of these on either side of an exterior door. Comes with 2 led edison style bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Good update
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our lights from 1997 with these. They installed smoothly and look great!
customer_reviews.author: tara

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. It was time to replace our outdoor lights and these are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: B. McK

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured... easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy to install... looks exactly as pictured and is a real improvement to the previous light!!!
customer_reviews.author: cmoney

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. If your thinking about it just do it. This is more than expected and great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Lynn Waller

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: We love these lights for the price and have gotten compliments putting them up on homes.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful curb appeal
customer_reviews.text: The light was perfectly explained so that I knew what I was getting. It’s very classy.
customer_reviews.author: TXGRL

customer_reviews.title: Very nice light
customer_reviews.text: I love the look from the glass to the size of the light. I have had many compliments on the lights, I have one at both the front and back doors, asking where I got them. The bulb is bright but a very gold light is put off from it. If you like that look, go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but faulty
customer_reviews.text: We loved this sconce, until the glass shattered without any provocation, sending shards loudly across the room. We were absolutely shocked, and very grateful that no one was standing under the lamp when this happened.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Mansell

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: We bought this light for our back patio door. I love the style and it looks perfect! The quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: updating outside lighting, looks good, works well, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well. Love the bulb. Fit right into my old light location.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and has held up.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this installed for several months and it has held up great. Looks awesome and was easy to install. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Fields

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome! Replaced all my outdoor lights with these
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Replaced all my outdoor lights with these. Nice size. Not small, but not too big either. I get a lot of compliments. And the price was a bit win!
customer_reviews.author: H. M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. I put it on the wall going down to the basement and it looks great
customer_reviews.author: Emily Doelger

customer_reviews.title: Cute light Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Used it inside for entryway light. Very cute and easy to install
customer_reviews.author: amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights!
customer_reviews.text: Great style for the price! Nice size and my husband had 5 installed around our house within an hour or two.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice light for a great value
customer_reviews.text: Really nice light. Easy install. The price here is much better than Wayfair.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Buy fixtures that you put your own bulbs in!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice light,love the embedded artificial raindrops in the glass.Lesson learned,do not buy led lights! They will burn out and you can’t replace the special light fixture.Buy the type where you put your own bulb in led bulb etc. You can buy bulbs with their own motion sensor built in if that’s what you want.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Great looking outdoor lighting
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these for my outdoor patio. I’m right by the Pacifica Coast. So, was looking for outdoor lighting that can withstand high moisture condition. Been installed for over a month now and so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Spyhunter100

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I purchased 3 of these and they were exactly what I was looking for. I did change the bulb that came with them because it had a yellow tone.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Deleon

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: It shows enough light for the application and the bulb is easy to replace, unlike it's predecessor.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Laakso

customer_reviews.title: Rileys review
customer_reviews.text: Love it thee bulb is super bright but the shade that covers it tones it down nicely I love the glass work
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Throws warm light
customer_reviews.text: As described. Love the LED light warm and much nicer than the previous bright white light. Perfect on the back patio
customer_reviews.author: Kenny D

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very modern outside light. I absolutely love it. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Porch Light
customer_reviews.text: This was a DIY project that was simple enough. In order to fit properly, my old box required a 2" extension adapter and some added mortar to make it flush with my stone wall. I was very happy with the results and updated look to my porch light.
customer_reviews.author: W. Sepulveda

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture is even better looking in person than in the photo. The electrician installed it in less than 10 minutes. The INCLUDED Edison light bulb gives off a lovely, warm light and the "bubbles" in the glass shade are a nice touch. Just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kim S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my entry hallway and it completely transformed my hallway. Great value for the item. I purchased a dimmer and made it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fixture for our outdoor pool area. Very easy to assemble and well made.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the most beautiful light with the look of raindrops make it expensivYou e.
customer_reviews.author: lizette casey

customer_reviews.title: It was too big for something like the normal size mounting base used with vinyl siding
customer_reviews.text: Well made and attractive but the base plate is quite larger than most fixtures. It was too big for something like the normal size mounting base used with vinyl siding. It would be fine on brick or other flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: xyz

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, straightforward install. You can use the included bulb, or swap out for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Collins

customer_reviews.title: Looks a lot more expensive than it was
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice for the price! Very happy with purchase. Easy to install-took about 15 minuets to remove old and have this one up.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful porch light!
customer_reviews.text: I love this light! It looks so great on the porch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and it domes with the light bulb. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jansing

customer_reviews.title: High end Look
customer_reviews.text: Great light for its price. Looks very high end. Easy installation and gives great light.
customer_reviews.author: CLGB

customer_reviews.title: Chipped glass and yellow illumimarion
customer_reviews.text: 1 lamp arrived with cracked and chipped glass at edge🤨 which I will try to fix/hide. The other lamp was AOK. I am going to change to a different light bulb because the bulb provided casts a distinctly yellow light...good for outdoors, but I placed these fixtures in a bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary E.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and porch is now well lit.
customer_reviews.text: great replacement for the drab light that this one replaced. Would definitely buy it again if I had another front door for it.
customer_reviews.author: Pouzzles

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. Ordered one for the front door and one for the side door. They look great!
customer_reviews.author: Ange

customer_reviews.title: Set these up indoors
customer_reviews.text: We installed these in our dining room. They look great. Bulbs are a little more yellow than i thought
customer_reviews.author: adam l.

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: No light bulb comes with it .. that’s why the four stars but it’s just like pictured
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Looks so good on house .excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking glass fixture.
customer_reviews.text: Like the look. My husband found he had to add washers to get it to fit the light fixture hole it was going in. The screws were not deep enough.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Parsons

customer_reviews.title: this is one great light, I have not installed it yet but ...
customer_reviews.text: this is one great light, I have not installed it yet but I can tell that it will fit my needs as I expected
customer_reviews.author: roy suarez

customer_reviews.title: Great instructions, easy installation!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and construction of this. my only wish was the ring at bottom of glass was stationary and not loose laying on it.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy k

customer_reviews.title: LightTheNight
customer_reviews.text: Good looking outdoor light, love the bronze patina. Also, the Edison lightbulbit came with is bright. Unit was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rodriguez

product_meta.title: Charlie Outdoor Indoor Wall Sconce, LED Bulb Included, Oil Rubbed Bronze, Clear Seeded Glass Shade,44127
product_meta.description: Color:Oil-rubbed Bronze| Style:SconceUpdate your space with Globe Electric's Charlie Outdoor Wall Sconce. The oil rubbed bronze finish enhances your space while the clear seeded glass shade makes sure your area is bright. Shining with the brightness of a 60 watt incandescent bulb, this included LED bulb uses only 7 watts of power saving you money in electricity costs. With a 2700 kelvin color temperature, this fixture emits a soft white light that is easy on the eyes. Completely dimmable with a compatible dimmer switch, you can create the lighting mood and ambiance you desire. Includes all mounting hardware for quick and easy installation and one 7 watt (60 watt equivalent) LED bulb. Weather Resistant
feature_bullets: DIMMABLE: fully dimmable with compatible dimmer switch to create the perfect atmosphere
RUSTIC DESIGN: The oil rubbed bronze finish, oversized top and bottom trim and overall oval shape adds a rustic element to any space
EASY INSTALL: Includes all mounting hardware for quick and easy installation
INCLUDED COMPONENTS: Wall Mount, Glass Shade, Mounting Hardware, LED Bulb, Instruction Sheet
SEEDED GLASS SHADE: The clear seeded glass shade showcases the beautiful included LED bulb and creates a wonderful spread of light
BULB INCLUDED: 1x E26/Medium Base ST19 Squirrel Cage Vintage Edison LED Light Bulb Included - 7-watt, 60-watt equivalent - 650 lumens - 2200 kelvin (soft white) - 15,000 hour bulb life

specifications.Included Components: Glass Shade, Mounting Hardware, LED Bulb, Instruction Sheet, Wall Mount
